name: 曾貴祺
objective: 認識通俗科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。

3. week 3  P unit 2, T, unit 2 PS   9. mid-term exam 
4  week 4  P unit 3, T, unit 3 PS   10. week 10, P, unit 8, T, unit 8 PS 
5. week 5  P unit 4, T, unit 4 PS    11. week 11, P, unit 9, T, unit 9 PS 
6. week 6, P unit 5, T, unit 5 PS    12. week 12, P, unit 10, T.unit 10 PS 
7. week 7 P unit 6, T, unit 6 PS      13. week 13 T. unit 11, 12, PS 
8. week 8 P unit 7, T, unit 7 PS      14. week 14 T.unit 13, 14 PS 
15. week 15. T. unit 15, 16 PS        16. week 16 T. 17, 18 PS 
17. week 17 T. 19, 20 PS                 18. final exam, term-paper due

attendance and oral report 30% 
mid-term 30%
final exam and term paper 40%
